SENT.plain: Clinical, genetic and endocrine findings in a male patient aged 27, diagnosed as a "Cat Eye" syndrome bearer are presented
Clinically the patient shows: moderate psychic retardation, high forehead, epicanthus, strabismus, microretrognathism, large, low inserted ears, kypho-scoliosis, genu valgum; mild hypothyroidism
Cytogenetic examination reveals the presence of an additional small acrocentric chromosome
